# Print Appointment Details

**URL:** https://www.mangomint.com/learn/print-appointment-details/

## Category
02 Calendar And Appointments

## Subcategory
Appointments And Time Blocks

## Article Content

HOME
CALENDAR & APPOINTMENTS
APPOINTMENTS
Print a Client's Appointment Details

You can print a client's appointment details from the calendar. You can also print a list of a client's upcoming appointments from the client details.

Link copied
Print a client's appointment details from the calendar

To print a client's appointment details, go to the calendar and select the appointment.

Select Print Details from the "..." menu.

The following information is included in the printout:

Client name and contact information

Last visit

Appointment details, including date, time, service, and service provider

Service purchase history

Product purchase history

Link copied
Print a client's upcoming appointments

To print a list of a client's upcoming appointments, open the client details and select Print Upcoming Appointments from the "..." menu.

The printout includes the date, time, service, and service provider for each upcoming appointment.

Can't find what you're looking for?

Start a chat with us to talk to a real person and get your questions answered, or browse our on-demand videos.
